PEASS toolkit - software example
http://bass-db.gforge.inria.fr/peass/

This is a joint work by Valentin Emiya (INRIA, France), Emmanuel Vincent (INRIA, France), Niklas Harlander (University of Oldenburg, France), Volker Hohmann (University of Oldenburg, France).

All audio files are modified versions of audio files from SiSEC 2008 (http://sisec2008.wiki.irisa.fr/).

All audio files in this folder are made available under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 2.0 license (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/). The authors are Hendrik Kayser and Jorn Anemuller part of the original dataset; Glen Phillips, Mark Engelberg, Psycho Voyager, Nine Inch Nails and Ali Farka Toure for music source signals; Maximo Cobos, Zaher Elchami, Michael Mandel and Ron Weiss for the source estimates; Shoko Araki and Emmanuel Vincent for mixture signals; Valentin Emiya for the modifications of each file. Part of the original dataset was supported by the European Commission under IP DIRAC.
